verses.text: The \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w*, who was among the \w herdmen|strong="H5349"\w* of \w Tekoa|strong="H8620"\w*, which he \w saw|strong="H2372"\w* concerning \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, two \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w earthquake|strong="H7494"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w roar|strong="H7580"\w* from \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and \w utter|strong="H5414"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; and the \w habitations|strong="H4999"\w* of the \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* shall \w mourn|strong="H0056"\w*, and the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w* shall \w wither|strong="H3001"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; For \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* of \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, and for \w four|strong="H0702"\w*, I will not turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \add the punishment\add* thereof; because they have \w threshed|strong="H1758"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* with threshing \w instruments|strong="H2742"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*:\f + \fr 1.3 \ft and…: or, yea, for four\f*\f + \fr 1.3 \ft turn…: or, convert it, or, let it be quiet\f*

But I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w*, which shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* the \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w* of \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w*.

I will \w break|strong="H7665"\w* also the \w bar|strong="H1280"\w* of \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, and cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* from the \w plain|strong="H1237"\w* of \w Aven|strong="H0206"\w*, and him that \w holdeth|strong="H8551"\w* the \w sceptre|strong="H7626"\w* from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Eden|strong="H5731"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* shall go into \w captivity|strong="H1540"\w* unto \w Kir|strong="H7024"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 1.5 \ft the plain…: or, Bikathaven\f*\f + \fr 1.5 \ft the house…: or, Beth-eden\f*

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; For \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* of \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*, and for \w four|strong="H0702"\w*, I will not turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \add the punishment\add* thereof; because they carried away \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* the \w whole|strong="H8003"\w* \w captivity|strong="H1546"\w*, to deliver \add them\add* \w up|strong="H5462"\w* to \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*:\f + \fr 1.6 \ft away captive…: or, them away with an entire\f*

But I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* on the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*, which shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* the \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w* thereof:

And I will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* from \w Ashdod|strong="H0795"\w*, and him that \w holdeth|strong="H8551"\w* the \w sceptre|strong="H7626"\w* from \w Ashkelon|strong="H0831"\w*, and I will \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* against \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*: and the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; For \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* of \w Tyrus|strong="H6865"\w*, and for \w four|strong="H0702"\w*, I will not turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \add the punishment\add* thereof; because they delivered \w up|strong="H5462"\w* the \w whole|strong="H8003"\w* \w captivity|strong="H1546"\w* to \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, and \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* not the \w brotherly|strong="H0251"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*:\f + \fr 1.9 \ft the brotherly…: Heb. the covenant of brethren\f*

But I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* on the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Tyrus|strong="H6865"\w*, which shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* the \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w* thereof.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; For \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, and for \w four|strong="H0702"\w*, I will not turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \add the punishment\add* thereof; because he did \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and did cast \w off|strong="H7843"\w* all \w pity|strong="H7356"\w*, and his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* did \w tear|strong="H2963"\w* \w perpetually|strong="H5703"\w*, and he \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* his \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*:\f + \fr 1.11 \ft did cast…: Heb. corrupted his compassions\f*

But I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* upon \w Teman|strong="H8487"\w*, which shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* the \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w* of \w Bozrah|strong="H1224"\w*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; For \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, and for \w four|strong="H0702"\w*, I will not turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \add the punishment\add* thereof; because they have ripped \w up|strong="H1234"\w* the women with \w child|strong="H2030"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, that they might \w enlarge|strong="H7337"\w* their \w border|strong="H1366"\w*:\f + \fr 1.13 \ft ripped…: or, divided the mountains\f*

But I will \w kindle|strong="H3341"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Rabbah|strong="H7237"\w*, and it shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* the \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w* thereof, with \w shouting|strong="H8643"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, with a \w tempest|strong="H5591"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w whirlwind|strong="H5492"\w*:

And their \w king|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w go|strong="H1980"\w* into \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*, he and his \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
